movie.title: The good, the bad and the ugly
movie.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

movie.title: Forrest Gump
movie.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movie.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movie.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movie.title: It's a Wonderful Life
movie.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

movie.title: Cidade de Deus(City of God)
movie.description: Two boys growing up in a violent neighborhood of Rio de Janeiro take different paths: one becomes a photographer, the other a drug dealer.

movie.title: Psycho
movie.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

movie.title: Back to the Future
movie.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
